title: New Faculty Onboarding and Tech Setup
description: A new faculty member, as part of their onboarding, needs to get their ID card and have their office computer set up.

tasks.description: As part of the HR onboarding checklist, direct the new faculty to the campus card office to have their photo taken and ID issued.
tasks.expected_outcome: HR agent provides clear directions and instructions.

tasks.description: After the ID is issued, the card office system automatically generates an IT support ticket.
tasks.expected_outcome: A ticket is created for desktop support to set up the new faculty's computer.

tasks.description: The IT technician uses the ticket to schedule a setup appointment with the new faculty member.
tasks.expected_outcome: IT schedules and completes the computer setup.
